analyzed: khye'u sa ta gi ri de gsos bskyed de cher gyur pa dang / ji tsam dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta chung ma dang bcas pa dus las 'das nas /
translated: When the child Satagiri was raised and grew up, at one time the yakṣa Satagiri and his wife died.

original: sa ta gi ri @223b khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dga' byed mas sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs te /
analyzed: sa ta gi ri @223b khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dga' byed mas sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs te /
translated: Satagiri became the master of the house, and the yakṣa maiden Nandabalā said to Satagiri, “Many sons born in the king’s capital are being kidnapped.

original: phrogs nas za bar 'dod do //
analyzed: phrogs nas za bar 'dod do //
translated: After they are kidnapped, they are eaten.”🔽He said,

original: zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa /
translated: The man said, I will do that.🔽🔽

original: sring mo yu bu cag gi phas yul nyams dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po dang / btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / grong dang / grong khyer pa dang / yul mi rnams la rtag tu srung ba dang /🔽skyob pa dang / skyob par byed do //
analyzed: sring mo yu bu cag gi phas yul nyams dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po dang / btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / grong dang / grong khyer pa dang / yul mi rnams la rtag tu srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / skyob par byed do //
translated: “Sister, we have heard that our father always protects,

original: zhes thos nas /
analyzed: zhes thos nas /
translated: defends, and provides refuge for the king of the delightful country of Kṣemaṃkara, his queens, princes, ministers, towns, cities, and country people.

original: yu bu cag gis rab tu bsrung bar bya bar rigs te /
analyzed: yu bu cag gis rab tu bsrung bar bya bar rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is right for us to protect him well.

original: 'di ni yu bu cag gi spyod yul yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni yu bu cag gi spyod yul yin gyi /
translated: This is our domain.

original: 'di la gzhan dag gcig gis kyal ka byed na yang de la yu bu cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na ci'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin bya mi rigs par khyod kyi sems bskyed pa de slar zlog cig /
analyzed: 'di la gzhan dag gcig gis kyal ka byed na yang de la yu bu cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na ci'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin bya mi rigs par khyod kyi sems bskyed pa de slar zlog cig /
translated: If someone else were to make fun of him, it would be right for us to stop it. Why do you think it is not right for you to do it? Turn back from that thought!”

analyzed: ces bsgo'o // de log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags kyis bsgos pas bcos su ma btub ste /
translated: But because she was tainted by the latent tendencies of her perverted aspiration, she could not be corrected.

original: yang sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar 'tshal lo //
analyzed: yang sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar 'tshal lo //
translated: Again, Satagiri said, Many people in the king's capital have given birth to sons. I want to eat the sons as soon as they are born.

original: zhes smras pa dang / sa ta gi ris de'i dus kyis brten pa las na bcos su mi btub par shes te /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / sa ta gi ris de'i dus kyis brten pa las na bcos su mi btub par shes te /
translated: Satagiri knew that it was not curable because of the time it had been there.

original: 'di phyi phyir zhing rtag tu dgag mi nus kyi /
analyzed: 'di phyi phyir zhing rtag tu dgag mi nus kyi /

analyzed: 'di phas kyang sngar byin te / bag mar btang ngo //
translated: This was given to him by his father.

original: snyam bsams nas /
analyzed: snyam bsams nas /
translated: He thought, I will give her in marriage.🔽He sent a letter to the yaksha Pancala:

analyzed: des gnod sbyin panytsa la bu mo dga' byed ma ni na chung du gyur @224a *// kyi / tshur gshegs la bag ma long zhig / ces yi ge spring pa dang / gnod sbyin panytsa la des gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka la dga' byed ma dpal chen po dang sbyar te /
translated: Nandini is a young girl. Come and take her as your wife.🔽The yaksha Pancala gave Nandini to the young yaksha Panchika.

original: bag mar blangs nas yul ga dha rar khrid do //
analyzed: bag mar blangs nas yul ga dha rar khrid do //

original: gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //

original: mo nam mdza' zhing sbobs pa dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba mang por gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: mo nam mdza' zhing sbobs pa dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba mang por gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When she was happy, confident, and full of joy and pleasure,

original: mos jo bo /
analyzed: mos jo bo /

analyzed: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs te /
translated: the many people living in Rājagṛha have had their newborn babies stolen.

original: bza' bar 'tshal lo //🔽zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa /
analyzed: bza' bar 'tshal lo // zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa /
translated: I want to eat them.”

original: bzang mo de ni khyod kyi gnyen gyi gnas yin te /
analyzed: bzang mo de ni khyod kyi gnyen gyi gnas yin te /
translated: He said, “Good lady, that is the home of your relatives.

original: der gzhan dag cig kyal ka byed na yang de bdag cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na khyod kyis ci'i phyir de lta khyod kyis mi rigs pa sems bskyed pa slar zlog cig /
analyzed: der gzhan dag cig kyal ka byed na yang de bdag cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na khyod kyis ci'i phyir de lta khyod kyis mi rigs pa sems bskyed pa slar zlog cig /
translated: If someone else were to do that there, it would be right for us to stop them. Why do you think like that? You should stop this unseemly thought.”

original: ces bsgo na /🔽de sngon gyis log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags bsgos pas sdod cig /🔽ces smras te /
analyzed: ces bsgo na / de sngon gyis log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags bsgos pas sdod cig / ces smras te /
translated: When he said this,

analyzed: cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
translated: she said, “Wait,”🔽and sat down.

analyzed: de gnod sbyin gzhon nu panytsi ka dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas bu pho zhig btsas te /

original: de'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te /
analyzed: de'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te /

original: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so //
analyzed: rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so //

original: de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum nas /
analyzed: de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum nas /
translated: In the same way, a second, a third,

analyzed: bu lnga brgya'i bar du btsas te de dag thams cad kyi tha chung gi ming dga' byed du btags so //
translated: and so on, up to five hundred sons were born. They all were given the name Pañcika.

original: de @224b nam bu las mthu rnyed par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de @224b nam bu las mthu rnyed par gyur pa na /
translated: When they had grown up,

analyzed: de na panytsi kas bzlog kyang ma bzlog nas de mi dga' bar gyur te /
translated: Pañcika tried to stop them, but he could not. He became unhappy

original: mi smra bar 'dug go //
analyzed: mi smra bar 'dug go //
translated: and sat in silence.

original: de nas gnod sbyin mo dga' byed ma gar dga' bar rang nyam du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin mo dga' byed ma gar dga' bar rang nyam du 'gro zhing /
translated: Then the yakṣiṇī Pañcika was able to go wherever she wanted,

original: rgyu ba dang / gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang / gnas par gyur to //
translated: to move about and stay as she pleased.

original: des rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar brtsams pa dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis /
analyzed: des rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar brtsams pa dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis /
translated: The people of Rājagṛha

original: rgyal po gzugs can snying po la /
analyzed: rgyal po gzugs can snying po la /
translated: said to King Bimbisāra,🔽“Your Majesty, someone is stealing our newborn children.

original: lha bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag gcig gis phrogs na su zhig bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid pa rma ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: lha bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag gcig gis phrogs na su zhig bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid pa rma ba'i rigs so //

original: zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos gnas thams cad la dbang ba rnams la /🔽kye rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag sus phrogs pa smros shig /
analyzed: zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos gnas thams cad la dbang ba rnams la / kye rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag sus phrogs pa smros shig /
translated: The king ordered the officials in charge of the city,

analyzed: ces bsgo nas /

analyzed: de dag gis nan tan du bag yod par rmed pa la zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na /

analyzed: su gang gi bud med dag sems can dang ldan par gyur na / des yul gzhan du phyung ste / bzhag go / zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos ltas @225a *//
translated: Whoever’s wife becomes pregnant🔽will be banished to another country.”

original: mkhan bkug ste rmas na /
analyzed: mkhan bkug ste rmas na /

original: de dag gis lha gnod sbyin khros kyi /
analyzed: de dag gis lha gnod sbyin khros kyi /

original: gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma stsal la /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma stsal la /

analyzed: mchod pa dang / bkur sti mdzod cig / ces gsol to // rgyal pos blon po rnams la /
translated: Make offerings and honor them.”

analyzed: kye song la rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags par byos shig /

analyzed: ces bsgo ba dang / de dag gis kyang de bzhin du dril bsgrags te; kye rgyal po'i khab dang grong khyer dang yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo dag nyon cig /
translated: They proclaimed this in the same way: Hey, all you people who have come from the capital and the various provinces!

original: lhas 'di skad bka' stsal te /
analyzed: lhas 'di skad bka' stsal te /
translated: The king has ordered this:

analyzed: bdag gi yul dang grong khyer dang yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po gnas pa rnams kyis /
translated: All you people who live in my country, in the capital, and in the various provinces,

original: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du /
translated: in all the abodes of the yakshas,

original: gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byos shig /
analyzed: gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byos shig /
translated: offer sacrificial cakes and make offerings and honor them.

original: ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis grong khyer de dag rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / sa rdo dag phyags te /
analyzed: ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis grong khyer de dag rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / sa rdo dag phyags te /
translated: The people living in the capital swept the city clean of stones, pebbles, and so forth, and made it fragrant with incense.

original: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab nas /
analyzed: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab nas /
translated: He sprinkled it with sandalwood water,

original: dri zhim po'i pog phor dag so sor dpyangs /
analyzed: dri zhim po'i pog phor dag so sor dpyangs /
translated: hung fragrant censers here and there,

original: rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i 'phan bsgreng /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i 'phan bsgreng /
translated: raised victory banners and divine streamers,

original: dar gyi lda ldi mang pos ni dpyangs te /
analyzed: dar gyi lda ldi mang pos ni dpyangs te /
translated: and hung many silk tassels.

original: me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor nas lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal @225b dga' ldan bzhin du mdzes par byas so //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor nas lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal @225b dga' ldan bzhin du mdzes par byas so //
translated: Having scattered various flowers, he made it beautiful like the pleasure grove of the gods in the Heaven of Joy.

original: de nas gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du gtor ma byin zhing mchod pa dang / bkur sti byas te /
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du gtor ma byin zhing mchod pa dang / bkur sti byas te /
translated: Then he offered sacrificial cakes in all the yakṣa abodes, made offerings, and paid homage.

original: 'on kyang dga' byed ma zhi bar ma gyur to //
analyzed: 'on kyang dga' byed ma zhi bar ma gyur to //
translated: However, Rati was not pacified.

original: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gis rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gis rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag /
translated: Then the gods dwelling in Rājagṛha announced to the people dwelling in Rājagṛha:

original: kye khyed la gnod sbyin mo dga' byed mas khyed kyi bu rnams phrogs kyi khyed thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul bar mdzad do //🔽zhes bstan to //
analyzed: kye khyed la gnod sbyin mo dga' byed mas khyed kyi bu rnams phrogs kyi khyed thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul bar mdzad do //🔽zhes bstan to //
translated: Hey, the yakṣiṇī Rati has taken your children. All of you go to the Blessed One, and the Blessed One will subdue her.

original: de dag gis kye 'di ni dga' byed ma ma yin gyi de ni 'phrog ma ste /
analyzed: de dag gis kye 'di ni dga' byed ma ma yin gyi de ni 'phrog ma ste /
translated: They said, “Hey, this is not Nandā, she is Hārītī.

original: des bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams phrogs so //
analyzed: des bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams phrogs so //
translated: She has stolen all the children we have given birth to.”

original: zhes smras pa dang / de'i ming dga' byed ma zhes bya ba ldog ste /🔽gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mar ming du 'gyur to //
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / de'i ming dga' byed ma zhes bya ba ldog ste / gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mar ming du 'gyur to //
translated: Her name Nandā was changed to Hārītī.

original: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag /
translated: Then the many people living in Rājagṛha

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: went to where the Blessed One was, and after arriving and bowing their heads at the Blessed One’s feet,

original: bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma 'di rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la yun ring po nas ma 'khon pa dang ni 'khon /🔽dgrar ma gyur pa dang ni dgrar gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma 'di rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la yun ring po nas ma 'khon pa dang ni 'khon / dgrar ma gyur pa dang ni dgrar gyur /
translated: they said, “Blessed One, this yakṣiṇī Hārītī has for a long time been a source of contention and enmity for the many people living in Rājagṛha.🔽She has become an enemy of those who were not her enemies.

original: snying mi ring ba la ni snying ring bar gyur /
analyzed: snying mi ring ba la ni snying ring bar gyur /
translated: She has become a stranger to those who were not strangers.

original: des bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams ni phrogs na /
analyzed: des bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams ni phrogs na /
translated: She has stolen all the children we have given birth to.

original: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje can thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma 'dul bar ci gnang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje can thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma 'dul bar ci gnang /
translated: “Compassionate Bhagavān, please tame the yakṣiṇī Hārītī out of love.”🔽

original: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom @226a *//
analyzed: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom @226a *//
translated: The Blessed One, out of compassion, has tamed the yakṣiṇī Hārītī. Is it possible for the Blessed One to tame the yakṣiṇī Pūrṇā out of compassion?

original: ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba bzhin /
analyzed: ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba bzhin /
translated: The Blessed One remained silent.

original: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la gnang ngo //
analyzed: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la gnang ngo //
translated: He granted permission to the many people living in Rājagṛha.

original: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ba bzhin gnang bar shes nas /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ba bzhin gnang bar shes nas /
translated: Then the many people living in Rājagṛha, understanding that the Blessed One had granted permission by remaining silent,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: bowed their heads at the feet of the Blessed One

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //
translated: and departed from the presence of the Blessed One.

original: de nas snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs /
analyzed: de nas snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs /
translated: Then in the morning, the Blessed One put on his lower robe and Dharma robes,

original: lhung bzed bsnams nas /🔽rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so //
analyzed: lhung bzed bsnams nas / rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so //
translated: took his alms bowl,🔽and went to Rājagṛha for alms.
